document_data.caption: A map showing the Kadan River flowing through east Zakhara.
document_data.name: Kadan River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Kadan River''' was a central river in the [[Cities of the Ancients]] in [[east Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Geography: The Kadan River flowed roughly north to south for hundreds of miles, originating in the unnamed mountains forming the border with the [[Haunted Lands]]. It flowed through the heart of the jungles that dominated the Ruined Kingdoms before finally emptying into the [[Foreigners' Sea]].
document_data.Description: Once its several unnamed tributaries joined together, the Kadan River wound from side to side like a snake as it made its way south to the sea.
